item.title: Showing the Approximate Total Weight of the Order on the Sales Order Processing Transaction Entry Screen
item.description: Steve Endow This article describes a customization for Dynamics GP that calculates and displays the total weight of a sales order. This is helpful for businesses that ship large or heavy products and need to estimate shipping costs before finalizing an order. Since Dynamics GP doesn’t inherently show the total order weight during order entry, a custom field was created to address this. Accurate inventory item weights are crucial for this customization to be effective.
